title: Peach Honey Sangria
directions: In a large pitcher, mix together the wine, peach schnapps, 1/4 cup honey, peaches, and lemon slices. Taste and add remaining 1/4 cup honey, if desired. Refrigerate for at least 4 hours, preferably overnight, before serving. Right before serving, add the seltzer.
ingredients: 1 bottle (750 ml) white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc
